entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux createdump (via dotnet-dump collect) segfaults in DAC taking a heap dump #57871
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • MonoAOTCompiler task: correctly write updated cache file when some of the files fail to compile #57866
    untriaged, area-Build-mono
  • GCC build failure for JIT code #57861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged, in pr
  • [API Proposal]: Change behaviour of Setting SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize (Or add documentation) #57859
    documentation, area-System.Security, untriaged
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(constIndOffset % elemSize) == 0' #57856
    arch-arm32, os-linux, JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • [release/5.0] Unable to bulid release/5.0 out of the box due to nuget signature errors #57849
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade netcoreapp3.1 and net5.0 to net6.0 for NET7 #57844
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Upgrade net461 tfms to net462 for NET7 #57842
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault #57840
    area-Host, untriaged
  • Remove debian 9 and add debian 11 to helix queues #57837
    area-Infrastructure, in pr, 6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json code generator generates invalid code when Json property contains a dash #57836
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • [Suggestion] Add an opt-in ability to use corehost (dotnet.dll) in projects under src/tests #57827
    area-Host, untriaged
  • System.Linq.Enumerable has special treatment of IList<T>, which should also apply to IReadOnlyList<T> #57822
    area-System.Linq, untriaged
  • Make use of ports in SPN optional #57818
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-compatibility, 5.0.x
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero. #57815
    area-System.Reflection, untriaged
  • Loader/classloader/regressions/523654/test532654_b/test532654_b.sh failing in CI #57812
    untriaged, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests crashing on Mariner OS #57810
    area-System.Security, disabled-test, runtime-mono, os-mariner
  • System.Drawing.Tests.SystemIconsTests.SystemIcons_Get_ReturnsExpected failing #57809
    area-System.Drawing, Future
  • AES using legacy code The string after encryption and decryption is not equivalent to the original one #57808
    area-System.Security, needs more info, untriaged
  • Stack overflow and Consistency check failed: FAILED: m_crawl.pFrame->IsTransitionToNativeFrame() in System.Runtime.Tests #57807
    area-VM-coreclr, untriaged
  • Regression in StreamPipeReader.CopyToAsync() causes part of already consumed content to be copied again #57806
    bug, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.0
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) when calling LdapConnection.SendRequest(SearchRequest req) at System.DirectoryServices.Protocols on Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.15.0-147-generic x86_64) #57805
    area-System.DirectoryServices, untriaged
  • .NET Core 2.1.30 release is missing release tags #57802
    area-Setup, untriaged
  • [android] $(EnableLLVM) started failing in .NET 6 rc1 #57800
    untriaged, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, in pr
  • User Story: .NET developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:2, Cost:L, Bottom Up Work, Team:Libraries, 7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\methodoverriding\\regressions\\549411\\exploit\\exploit.cmd #57794
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • Consider moving PEImage into utilcode #57793
    area-VM-coreclr, untriaged
  • HttpClient rejects valid certificates for dot-appended FQDNs #57792
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged

Closed

  • [.NET 6] CultureInfo constructor does not throw CultureNotFoundException for unknown culture name #57310
    area-System.Globalization, blocking-release, regression-from-last-release, 6.0.0
  • Nullable<T>.Value following Nullable<T>.HasValue can be optimized #13699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, JitUntriaged, Future
  • JSON source generator fails to compile when providing the full name of serializable class #57579
    area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, needs more info, 6.0.0
  • Source generation failing when JsonSerializerContext class is contained in another class #57516
    bug, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Test failure : Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_45929\\test45929\\test45929.cmd #46803
    arch-arm32, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • dotnet-hostfxr-6.0.0-preview rpm is missing dependency ref to dotnet-host #57215
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.0
  • [Feature Request]: Diagnostics for App Context switches #56142
    enhancement, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [Android] System.ComponentModel.Primitives.Tests failed in CI (PACKAGE_INSTALLATION_FAILURE) #57821
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, os-android, untriaged
  • dotnet-dump collect doesn't writes output #57820
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged
  • Question: Limits of loaded assemblies #57652
    question, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, untriaged
  • System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely #57030
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, Future
  • Please consider letting a user set `MaxPayloadLength` (or, adhere to HTTP/2 spec) #56542
    enhancement, area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, 7.0.0
  • SocketAsyncEngine not signaling ManualResetEvent #53921
    area-System.Net.Sockets, needs more info, 7.0.0
  • System.net.mail.SmtpClient fails to send mail from server having NTLM authentication #51260
    area-System.Net, needs more info, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Violation of nullability constraint for certificate validation during TLS renegotiation in HTTP request #55334
    bug, area-System.Net.Security, 5.0.x
  • Designer pannel can't copy and paste controls. #57814
    untriaged
  • Unhandled exception about "System.Drawing.Common is not supported on this platform" occurs when running winforms application #57791
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • User Story: .NET Core developers can verify more APIs for their correct usage to speed up their development #43617
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:1, Cost:XL, Team:Libraries, 6.0.0
  • Assert failure `!success && GetLastError() == ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER` on Windows 7 #57137
    area-System.Threading, os-windows, runtime-coreclr, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Recurring test failures in tracing due to class loader alloc tracker heap corruption #57461
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    area-Serialization, untriaged
  • Feed unreliability affecting CI #55449
    tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, Future
  • system.io.pipelines.tests.flushasynctests.flushasync_throwsifwriterreaderwithexception #55435
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, disabled-test, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0
  • Several System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs tests fail with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException #31281
    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, Future
  • runtime xunit wrapper build failed #45378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    bug, os-linux, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • bundled_self_contained_nocompression_app_run_succeeds blocking CI #53551
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher_DirectorySymbolicLink_TargetsFile_Fails #53366
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success failing on win-arm64 #51651
    arch-arm64, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, test-run-core, Future
  • InterruptInFinallyBlockTest_SkipOnDesktopFramework failed on Linux Debug x64 Mono in CI #43953
    area-Threading-mono, runtime-mono, 7.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.OSSupportTest.IOControl_SIOCATMARK_Unix_Success test failure on macOS #50748
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, test-run-core, blocking-clean-ci, Future
  • SelfContained_NetCoreApp3_CompatMode_SingleFile_APITests failed in CI #43917
    area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Flaky tests: System.ComponentModel.Composition.Tests #32030
    area-System.ComponentModel, disabled-test, runtime-mono, Future
  • Safe handle use after close in System.Net.Security.Tests #46770
    bug, area-System.Net.Security, test-run-core, 7.0.0

    area-System.Net.Security, disabled-test, os-mac-os-x, test-run-core, Future

    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, Future

    area-System.Net, disabled-test, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, test-run-core, Future

    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, Future
  • CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #48717
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0

    area-System.Threading.Tasks, disabled-test, Future

    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, test bug, test-run-core, 7.0.0

    area-System.IO, disabled-test, Future

    area-Single-File, blocking-clean-ci, 6.0.0
  • CI is currently broken "You cannot extract a file outside of the target path" #52596
    area-Infrastructure
  • Infrastructure - Status/Health #702
    area-Infrastructure, Future
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, untriaged

    area-System.Security, blocking-release, os-linux, in pr, 6.0.0

    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 6.0.0

    area-DependencyModel, in pr, Future

    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.0

  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: don't emit impossible generic function instantiations #54850

    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-Options, 7.0.0

  • Exceptions when serializing log events events in the background #57803

    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, in pr, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove more ngen-related dead code and config vars #57874
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Apply feedback from PR #57204 #57872
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57869
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't regress SkipLocalsInit optimization on < 6.0 .NETCoreApp assets #57868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc1] MonoAOTCompiler: Check for proxy file's target only when the cache is… #57867
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • MonoAOTCompiler: Check for proxy file's target only when the cache is… #57865
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57864

  • Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57863
    area-System.Threading

    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

    area-VM-coreclr

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement X509Certificate2.RawDataMemory #57835
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

    area-System.Text.Json, disabled-test, 6.0.0
